this image is done with dd under linux. its a simple iso image from the microsd card under the label with the serialnumber on the backside.

but it will not work if you copy it on your microsd card with dd, cause this is secured. maybe there is a security check if the serial number of the microsd card is the correct on.

maybe someone will find a security hole.
